Package seng201.team15.models

Class Tower

java.lang.Object
seng201.team15.models.Tower
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShopTower1, ShopTower10, ShopTower11, ShopTower12, ShopTower2, ShopTower3, ShopTower4, ShopTower5, ShopTower6, ShopTower7, ShopTower8, ShopTower9, StartingTowerFour, StartingTowerOne, StartingTowerThree, StartingTowerTwo
public class Tower extends Object
Class for towers that will be used to fill carts with resources.

  • Constructor Details

    • Tower

      public Tower(String resourceType, int resourceAmount, double reloadSpeed, int level, int cost)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      resourceType - the resource type of the tower
      resourceAmount - how many resources the tower will fill the cart with each period
      reloadSpeed - the period between filling the cart up with resourceAmount (In mins)
      level - the current level of the tower
      cost - the cost value associated to the tower

      public void setReloadSpeed(double reloadSpeed)
      Sets the towers reload speed to the provided input while checking that the reload speed doesn't go below 0.1
      Parameters:
      reloadSpeed - the speed the tower can fill up the carts
